Line1.6DE47: Interesting. This ledger was written by the Horadrim. This is chronicling spells and theories created by Rathma, the first necromancer.
Line16.BAE4: That’s not what we are looking for.
Line18.6DE47: It’s all we have. My mother will help us through.
Line20.BAE4: Are you sure this is a good idea?
Line7.6DE47: No, but it can still work. There must be a spell in this book we can use to bring my mother back. She knows the ritual to cross the Black Lake.
